This year, the Queen and Prince Philip will be apart from their loved ones as they have a quiet and Covid-safe Christmas in Windsor.

articles.title: Ranvir Singh makes career announcement after leaving Strictly Come Dancing - Birmingham Live
articles.description: Scottish TV presenter Lorraine told her she'd be tuning in from home as Ranvir replaces her next week
articles.content:
